column5: The Moonveil. I honestly have no clue what this does but it's like insanely sharp so prolly use with caution or something.
Ketheric Thorm's shield. One of the Chosen Three of the Absolute as well as a Chosen of Myrkul. Bro was a half-elf who lost his shield which is a pretty good deterent against projectiles...
column6: Ketheric's Shield lies on the ground, it wants to be picked up.

column5: A classic. Lights the way so you can see. You can use it in dark areas.
Yet another classic. You drink this thing and it'll restore some of your health, simple.
column6: A Health Potion lies on it's side.
